preference.name: Cls0HierarchyNode_relation_search_order
preference.preference_description: Lists the Relations and Properties (in order of preference) used to obtain the preview image source object for Classification Hierarchy nodes. Valid values are Relations and Properties of a Cls0HierarchyNode Business object, separated by a comma (,).
